评论详情: I was getting my brother a gold watch so he could see if he actually liked the look with his work outfits, so I was ordering one on the low end expecting it to likely end up in the back of a sock drawer after a month or two. However, the material, weight, and in-person looks are reminiscent of a $12.00 watch you would get from Marshals or Burlington Coat Factory that falls apart after a week.  If you are looking for a low-end watch, spend $18 more dollars and order a By Benyar (I've only seen them on Amazon). They aren't high quality either, but at least they feel like a piece of adult jewelry instead of flimsy costume jewelry.
